meanings.definition: A type of athletic shoe typically made of canvas and rubber.
meanings.sent1: I bought a new pair of sandshoes for my gym class.
meanings.sent2: She tied the laces of her sandshoe before going for a run.
meanings.sent3: The sandshoe looked like it was ready to race ahead of me!
meanings.sent4: His sandshoe was a trusty companion on the track, always propelling him forward.
meanings.sent5: The bright red sandshoe stood out among the other shoes in the store.

meanings.definition: To wear or put on a sandshoe.
meanings.sent1: I will sandshoe my feet before heading out for a walk.
meanings.sent2: He sandshoes quickly before joining the game.
meanings.sent3: She sandshoed her way through the obstacle course with ease.
meanings.sent4: Sandshoeing his feet, he felt ready to take on any challenge.
meanings.sent5: The children giggled as they sandshoed their oversized shoes.
